mapper.select: select TO_CHAR(o.ord_regdate, 'DD') as sales_day, sum(d.dt_amount * d.dt_price) as sales_total from order_tbl o inner join ordetail_tbl d on o.ord_code = d.ord_code where TO_CHAR(o.ord_regdate, 'YYYY/MM') = #{ord_month} group by TO_CHAR(o.ord_regdate, 'DD') order by sales_day

select TO_CHAR(o.ord_regdate, 'MM') as sales_month, sum(d.dt_amount * d.dt_price) as sales_total from order_tbl o inner join ordetail_tbl d on o.ord_code = d.ord_code where TO_CHAR(o.ord_regdate, 'YYYY') = #{ord_year} group by TO_CHAR(o.ord_regdate, 'MM') order by sales_month

select c.cat_name primary_cd, sum(d.dt_amount * d.dt_price) sales_p from product_tbl p inner join ordetail_tbl d on p.pro_num = d.pro_num inner join ( select c2.cat_name, c1.cat_code from category_tbl c1, category_tbl c2 where c1.cat_prtcode = c2.cat_code ) c on p.cat_code = c.cat_code inner join order_tbl o on o.ord_code = d.ord_code and TO_CHAR(o.ord_regdate, 'YYYY/MM') = #{ord_month} group by c.cat_name, TO_CHAR(o.ord_regdate, 'YYYY/MM') order by c.cat_name

select p.pro_num, p.pro_name, sum(d.dt_amount) as total_sales, p.pro_price, sum(d.dt_amount * d.dt_price) total_sales_price, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY sum(d.dt_amount) DESC) as sales_rank from product_tbl p inner join ordetail_tbl d on p.pro_num = d.pro_num inner join order_tbl o on o.ord_code = d.ord_code where TO_CHAR(o.ord_regdate, 'YYYY/MM') = #{ord_month} group by p.pro_num, p.pro_name, p.pro_price order by total_sales desc
